channel.title: Mobility – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Gel Lined Digital Finger & Toe Caps
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Soft, comfortable, stretchable fabric tubing that is fully lined with a moisturizing gel interior that comforts and cushions sensitive corns, warts, blisters and calluses. Guards against friction and painful irritation from overlapping or rubbing toes. Tubes are capped to offer full protection in typically hard to cover areas. Absorbs shock and pressure better than less effective drugstore foam products that quickly wear out.

The post Gel Lined Digital Finger & Toe Caps appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Tubing may be cut-to-size for a custom fit. Dermatologically tested, diabetic friendly, latex-free, washable and reusable. Can also be used to protect sore or tender spots on the finger. Use the 35 mm with the big toes or thumbs.

  • Elastic sleeve hugs the digit and stays put, so you can wear it in any shoe, closed or open toe, and also when barefoot
  • Silicone gel cushioning helps prevent blistering and helps to relieve hot spots, such as painful warts, hard or soft corns
  • Molds to the skin, insulating the sensitive area against shock and pressure
  • Capped design allows for total protection, even in tough places
  • Three sizes- 20 mm, 25 mm and 35 mm. 25 mm is suitable for most fingers and 20 mm for toes
  • Durable, washable (by hand) and reusable

The post Gel Lined Digital Finger & Toe Caps appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Full Pregnancy Support Maternity Belt with Optional Strap
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This abdominal binder is designed to alleviate pregnancy induced lower back pain and discomfort by supporting the lumbar and abdominal regions with soft, flexible fabric to accommodate growth of your baby throughout your term. Wear discretely under your clothes, or over a tank top or cami for additional comfort.

The post Full Pregnancy Support Maternity Belt with Optional Strap appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Features an easily adjustable Velcro side strap that you can fit to your growing belly.
  • Two aluminum braces offer support and prevent slipping, keeping the belly band securely in place.
  • The belly band promotes correct posture and balance, allowing you to maintain your active lifestyle.
  • Alleviate backaches, promote correct posture and prevent stretch marks as your belly grows.
  • It also helps reduce the risk of stretch marks.

The post Full Pregnancy Support Maternity Belt with Optional Strap appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Cotton Transfer Belt in Different Colors & Patterns
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT Surgical Cotton Transfer Belt is constructed from heavy duty cotton webbing with a secure fastening metal buckle.Â Designed to be a heavy duty weight bearing belt and stays securely in place when fastened. Available in americana, featuring stripes of red and blue, as well as navy. Pink stripes are out of stock.

The standard belt is available multiple sizes at a lower price thanks to the plastic buckles.

The post Cotton Transfer Belt in Different Colors & Patterns appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Instructions

  • Transferring residents who are partially dependent, have some weight-bearing capacity, and are cooperative. Transfers such as bed to chair, chair to chair, or chair to car; when repositioning residents in chairs; supporting residents during ambulation; and in some cases when guiding and controlling falls.
  • The proper way to apply it is to keep two fingers between the belt and the patient’s body. Tighten it until it has just enough room for your fingers.
  • Ensure a layer of clothing is between residents’ skin and the belt to avoid abrasion. Keep resident as close as possible to caregiver during transfer.

The post Cotton Transfer Belt in Different Colors & Patterns appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Velcro Lumbo Sacro with 4 Stays | 10″ Back
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The brace is lightweight which leaves the user more comfortable and allows it to be used any time of the day. The brace is made of a strong, flexible, and breathable advanced nylon ensuring product satisfaction. The inside and outside panels are rigid in design to allow for better support of the abdominals and for consistent relief.

The post Velcro Lumbo Sacro with 4 Stays | 10″ Back appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Size Waist
Small 30″ – 45″
Large 45″ – 60″

The post Velcro Lumbo Sacro with 4 Stays | 10″ Back appeared first on AT Surgical.
